title: Consecutive Double Letters 2
description: Fill in the blanks to find words that have two sets of double letters in a row.

clues.prompt: A woodwind instrument that dates back to the mid 16th century.
A sweet treat that is sometimes made with nuts or raisins.
A term that can be used to describe boats and ships.
This word has 3 consecutive double letters!

title: Symmetry Sleuth
description: Decode the mirror pair that shares the same beginning and ending letter.

clues.prompt: A five-letter musical term that reads the same forwards and backwards.
A number that swings between the same digit twice.
The word for a long-billed wading bird that ends the way it begins.
